name: Food Blogger Specialty Chef
description:
Hello girls!
Are you ready for an amazing free chef cooking and food blogger game to have some real time adventure in your kitchen. Every girl likes to be a crazy chef master. But this girl has got popularity by posting some nice dishes on her food blogs. To be a real chef and kitchen celebrity, play this game for free with your friends and family. The idea was to open a restaurant and make some delicious food recipes and then post it to her blogs, get appreciations from her viewers on her blogs and finally get famous.

First of all this open a restaurant with the help pf her friend and then design the interior of restaurant more trendy and stylish. She makes some delicious dishes like pasta, nuggets, burger, pizza, breakfast, lunch, dinner and many more. There is a proper cashier management system in her restaurant. There is a variety of different bakery items.

To become a famous food blogger is not an easy job. First pick a topic you are passionate about it. Then read a lot and make your blog easy to reach or find. If you are blogging about travel, food or fashion then design your blog accordingly. Choose interesting and attractive themes about your blog. You need to provide brilliant and accessible contents. Then promoting your blogs through social media platforms. Keep interacting with your readers. There are common used terms for blogs include:

* web log
* portal
* forum
* e-network
* weblog network
* live blog
* aggregator

To be a real chef kitchen celebrity is also not an easy job. For a famous chef you need particular studies. Have a passion about culinary arts field. Enroll in a culinary arts education in some famous institute. Programs are offered at trade, colleges and culinary institutes. Most programs offered education in nutrition, sanitary food preparation techniques, pastry making, and other basic cooking knowledge in real time cooking. If you plan to eventually start your own restaurant then find the colleges that offer classes in business and management. Get the different cooking adventure certificates from competitions and short courses.

Do not forget to play all of our other makeup, makeover, cooking, tailoring, babies and dress up games for girls and kids.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
